front.title: Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) Mapping for Chinese Domain Names

abstract.t: This document describes an extension of Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) mapping for the provisioning and management of Chinese Domain Names (CDNs), especially for variant CDNs. Specified in XML, this extended mapping is applied to provide additional features required for the provisioning of DNS security extensions for CDNs.
